decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.  Reason for condition: To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The premises shall be used for B1 purposes only and for no other purpose unless agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The garage(s) and/or car parking space(s) shown on the approved drawing no 5308/01D shall be provided before commencement of the use of the land or building(s) hereby permitted and thereafter shall be kept free from obstruction and shall not be used for purposes other than the parking of vehicles in conjunction with the development hereby permitted.  Reason for condition: To ensure the provision of adequate off-street parking in order to prevent additional parking in surrounding streets which could be detrimental to amenity and prejudicial to highway safety.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work in pursuance of this permission shall be carried on before 0800 hours or after 1800 hours on Mondays to Fridays inclusive, before 0800 hours or after 1300 hours on Saturdays, and at no time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.  Reason for condition: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 5 - Details of the roof and brick samples to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory appearance for the development and to protect the visual amenities of the area.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions contained in Regulation 6 of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1992, no advertisements shall be displayed without the express consent in writing of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To protect the visual amenities of the area.

Condition : 7 - Before the building hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in Unit 3, First Floor, North elevation of the building shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.  Reason for condition: To protect the privacy and amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 8 - The garage(s) hereby permitted shall not be used other than for the parking of private motor vehicles and no trade or business shall be carried out therefrom.  Reason for condition: To retain adequate off-street parking facilities.

Condition : 9 - The floors and walls between each of the proposed units and adjacent units shall be so adapted as to achieve a reasonable resistance to airbourne sound and, where relevant, impact sound as far as is practical having regard to the existing construction. The insulation shall be in accordance with a scheme previously submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory standard of residential amenity.

Condition : 10 - Before any part of the development hereby permitted is first occupied a means of enclosure of a height and type to be approved first in writing by the Local Planning Authority shall be erected along the boundaries of the site and shall be permanently maintained thereafter.  Reason for condition  To ensure adequate security and to protect the visual amenities of the area.

Condition : 11 - All plant and machinery shall be enclosed and soundproofed in accordance with a scheme to be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and such sound insulation shall be permanently maintained thereafter.  Reason for condition: In order to protect the amenities of nearby residents.

Condition : 12 - No external lighting shall be installed without the prior approval in writing of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: In order to safeguard the amenities of nearby residents.

Condition : 13 - Before the building is first used the measures for access for disabled persons shown on drawing no. 5308/01D shall be implemented to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority and shall be permanently maintained thereafter.  Reason for condition: To ensure that there is adequate access to the building for disabled persons.

Condition : 14 - A tree planting/landscaping scheme which includes full details of species, size of plants and spacing shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval and be implemented during the next planting season after the completion of building operations on the site, or within any such longer period as may be agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. The Council will require a maintenance period of three years during which dead, dying or defective trees, shrubs and ground cover must be replaced.  Reason for condition: To enhance and maintain the visual amenities and character of the locality.

Condition : 15 - No storage of materials associated with the permitted B1 business units shall occur outside the building hereby approved at any time.  Reason for condition: To protect the visual amenities of the area and amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 16 - No noise generating machinery shall be operated at the premises which increases noise levels above a maximum of 2dBA when measured from the nearest noise sensitive residential property.  Reason for condition: To protect the amenities of occupiers of neighbouring dwellings.

Condition : 17 - The B1 business premises hereby approved and associated deliveries shall only operate between the hours of 7.00am to 7.00pm Mondays to Fridays and 8.00am to 6.00pm on Saturday and not at any times on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays, unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local |Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To protect the amenities of occupiers of neighbouring residential dwellings.

Condition : 18 - Prior to the implementation of the scheme herby approved, details of the design and revised siting of the proposed bin enclosure and generator shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and erected prior to occupation of the first units.  Reason for condition: In order to safeguard the amenities of occupiers of neighbouring residential dwellings.

Condition : 19 - Prior to the implementation of the scheme hereby approved, details of provision for cycle parking facilities within the site shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and erected prior to occupation of the first units.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development and adequate cycle facilities.

Condition : 20 - No structure, plant, equipment or machinery shall be placed, erected or installed on or above the roof or on external walls without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: In order not to prejudice the visual appearance of the building.
description: ERECTION OF TWO STOREY BUILDING COMPRISING OF EIGHT B1 BUSINESS UNITS WITH ASSOCIATED OFF-STREET PARKING.
